page.title: 07POPULATION
page.content: WHILST THERE IS A WIDE AGE SPAN AMONG THE POPULATION, THERE ARE MANY ELDERLY RETIRED PEOPLE, AND MIDDLE-AGED PEOPLE WHO HAVE BEEN MADE REDUNDANT OR TAKEN EARLY RETIREMENT. PART OF THE POPULATION IS STATIC: FAMILIES HAVING LIVED IN THE SAME AREA FOR GENERATIONS AND OFTEN THREE GENERATIONS OF A FAMILY WILL LIVE CLOSE TO EACH OTHER. SOME OF THE POPULATION IS MORE MOBILE BUYING THE SMALL TERRACED HOUSES AS STARTER HOMES AND MOVING WHEN FINANCIAL CIRCUMSTANCES ALLOW TO MORE EXPENSIVE HOUSES. THE POPULATION ALSO COVERS A WIDE SPAN OF SOCIAL CLASSES. THE POPULATION OF MARGROVE PARK, CHARLTON, SLAPEWATH, AYSDALE GATE IS PREDOMINANTLY WORKING CLASS, BUT STANGHOW HAS A MORE MIDDLE CLASS POPULATION.
